title: Recognized by His Family, the True Young Master Went on a Killing Spree
author: Unknown
synopsis:
After cultivating for 22 years, Qin Yang finally learned that he was actually the true young master who had been mistakenly swapped in the Qin family.

After going down the mountain to reunite with his family, he was met with their disdain and ridicule. Qin Yang decided he would no longer endure it.

Instead of exhausting himself, he would rather drive others insane. The Daoist master went on a killing spree.

chapter_titles.51: Father-in-Law, My Brother Is Your Grandson
chapter_titles.53: Try to Hold Back a Little
